free_text.Content: Lasers, confocal microscopy, high speed imaging, multi-photon,  lifetime, single molecule detection
free_text.Form of examination: Continuous control, presentation of a mini project and exam.

en.title: Biomicroscopy II
en.library_recommends:
• "Handbook of Biological Confocal Microscopy". Year:2006. ISBN:978-0-387-25921-5
  • "Microscopy, immunohistochemistry, and antigen retrieval methods : for light and electron microscopy / M.A. Hayat". Year:2002. ISBN:0-306-46770-4
  • "Theory and practice of histological techniques / ed. by John D. Bancroft ... [et al.]". Year:2008. ISBN:978-0-443-10279-0

Kluwer Academic / Plenum Publishers (2002).[br/][br/]Theory and Practice of histological techniques, ed. John D Bancroft, Marilyn Gamble, Churchill Livingstone).[br/][br/]Handbook of Biological Confocal Microscopy, Pawley, James (Ed.), 3rd ed., 2006, XXVIII, 988 p., 545 illus., 236 in colour, Hardcover.[br/]
free_text.Contenu: Optique de Fourier pour analyse de contraste.[br/]Contraste de phase et microscopie.[br/]Détection moléculaire.[br/]Cohérence et tomographie.[br/]Superresolution.
